##### Short Intro
**Leo** graduated with a BS in chemistry from *Louisiana State University* and worked as a quality control chemist at *Valero Energy* and *REG* before returning to grad school to pursue a meaningful career in research. He is currently studying metabolomics and proteomics of iron-starved bacteria under [Prof. Mario Rivera](https://sites01.lsu.edu/faculty/rivera/) at LSU, where they are striving to validate iron homeostasis as a potential target for antibiotic development.
